title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry the pancetta until crisp.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated Parmesan cheese.
Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture off the heat.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Saute onions, garlic, and ginger until soft.
Add spices and cook until fragrant.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Add tomatoes and coconut milk, and simmer until chicken is cooked through.
Serve with rice.

title: Chocolate Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix dry ingredients together.
Beat eggs, milk, and melted butter together.
Combine wet and dry ingredients and mix until smooth.
Pour batter into a greased baking pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
Let cool before serving.

title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop the romaine lettuce.
Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Add croutons and grated Parmesan cheese.
Serve immediately.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan.
Add garlic and ginger and cook until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender.
Add soy sauce and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
Serve with rice or noodles.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder together.
Beat eggs and milk together.
Combine wet and dry ingredients and mix until smooth.
Heat a pan and melt butter.
Pour batter into pan and cook until bubbles form on the surface.
Flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve with maple syrup.

title: Beef Stew
instructions: Brown beef in a pot.
Add onions and garlic and cook until soft.
Add beef broth, tomato paste, and vegetables.
Simmer for 1-2 hours until beef is tender.
Serve with crusty bread.

title: Tiramisu
instructions: Dip ladyfingers in espresso and layer in a dish.
Mix mascarpone cheese, eggs, and sugar until smooth.
Spread cheese mixture over ladyfingers.
Repeat layers and refrigerate for at least 4 hours.
Dust with cocoa powder before serving.

title: Guacamole
instructions: Mash avocados in a bowl.
Add chopped tomatoes, onions, and cilantro.
Mix in lime juice and salt to taste.
Serve with tortilla chips.

title: Chicken Noodle Soup
instructions: Saute onions, carrots, and celery until soft.
Add garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add chicken broth and bring to a boil.
Add chicken and egg noodles and simmer until noodles are cooked.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Saute onions, garlic, carrots, and celery until soft.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Add tomatoes and simmer for 1-2 hours.
Serve over cooked spaghetti.

title: Apple Pie
instructions: Peel and slice apples.
Mix apples with sugar, flour, and spices.
Line a pie dish with crust and fill with apple mixture.
Top with butter and cover with another crust.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 45-50 minutes.
Let cool before serving.

title: Lasagna
instructions: Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
Brown ground beef and mix with tomato sauce.
Layer noodles, meat sauce, ricotta, mozzarella, and Parmesan cheese.
Repeat layers and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30-40 minutes.
Let cool before serving.

title: Fish Tacos
instructions: Season fish fillets with spices and grill until cooked.
Warm tortillas on a griddle.
Fill tortillas with fish, cabbage, cilantro, sour cream, and salsa.
Serve with lime wedges.

title: Jollof Rice
instructions: Blend tomatoes, onions, bell peppers, and Scotch bonnet peppers.
Saute the blended mixture until thickened.
Add spices, rice, and chicken.
Simmer until rice is cooked and chicken is tender.
Serve with fried plantains.
